definitions.definition: A number of things that follow on one after the other or are connected one after the other.
examples: A series of seemingly inconsequential events led cumulatively to the fall of the company.

definitions.definition: A television or radio program consisting of several episodes that are broadcast at regular intervals .
examples: “Friends” was one of the most successful television series in recent years.

definitions.definition: Synonym of season ( “ one of the groups of episodes that together make up a whole series ” ) .
examples: I enjoyed the third series of “Friends”.

definitions.definition: The sequence of partial sums ∑ i = 1 n a i {\displaystyle \sum _{i=1}^{n}{a_{i}}} of a given sequence a i .
examples: The harmonic series has been much studied.

definitions.definition: A group of matches between two sides, with the aim being to win more matches than the opposition.
examples: The Blue Jays are playing the Yankees in a four-game series .

definitions.definition: A subdivision of a genus, a taxonomic rank below that of section (and subsection) but above that of species.
A parcel of rough diamonds of assorted qualities.
A set of consonants that share a particular phonetic or phonological feature .

main_definition: A number of things that follow on one after the other or are connected one after the other.
secondary_definitions: ( broadcasting ) A television or radio program consisting of several episodes that are broadcast at regular intervals .
( broadcasting , chiefly UK ) Synonym of season ( “ one of the groups of episodes that together make up a whole series ” ) .
( Discuss this sense) ( mathematics ) The sequence of partial sums ∑ i = 1 n a i {\displaystyle \sum _{i=1}^{n}{a_{i}}} of a given sequence a i .
( cricket , baseball ) A group of matches between two sides, with the aim being to win more matches than the opposition.
( botany ) A subdivision of a genus, a taxonomic rank below that of section (and subsection) but above that of species.
( commerce ) A parcel of rough diamonds of assorted qualities.
( phonology ) A set of consonants that share a particular phonetic or phonological feature .
